body:
**version:**
Kubernetes v1.7.0-alpha.0.1164+e823af8a873bda   (compiled by the newest code)

**command:**
./kubelet  --hostname-override=10.62.62.106 --api-servers==http://10.62.62.104:8080/  --logtostderr=true --log-dir=/tmp &
